column4: i'm building a new machine for myself next week, and about nvidias proprietary drivers, do they support the 8600 series well yet?
the proprietary drivers do but the included drivers don't support 3d
let me clarify that. restricted drivers won't support 3d but the 100.14.11 drivers do.
hmm, so you mean that the latest drivers from nvidia do work. i tend to build those with envy anyway
